OrthoRegion.cpp

00001 #ifndef ORTHO_REGION_CPP
00002 #define ORTHO_REGION_CPP
00003 
00004 /*

00010 
00011 #include "OrthoRegion.h"
00012 #include <util/space/Dimension.h>
00013 #include <util/math/feq.h>
00014 #include <util/global.h>
00015 
00016 namespace Util
00017 {
00018 
00019    /* 
00020    * Constructor. 
00021    */
00022    OrthoRegion::OrthoRegion() 
00023    {
00024       for (int i = 0; i < Dimension; ++i) {
00025          minima_[i]      = 0.0;
00026          maxima_[i]      = 1.0;
00027          lengths_[i]     = 1.0;
00028          halfLengths_[i] = 0.5;
00029       };
00030       volume_ = 1.0;
00031    }
00032 
00033    /* 
00034    * Set lengths_, halfLengths_, and volume_ to consistent values.
00035    */
00036    void OrthoRegion::resetRegion() 
00037    {
00038       for (int i = 0; i < Dimension; ++i) {
00039          assert(maxima_[i] > minima_[i]);
00040          lengths_[i] = maxima_[i] - minima_[i];
00041          halfLengths_[i] = 0.5*lengths_[i];
00042       };
00043       volume_ = lengths_[0] * lengths_[1] * lengths_[2];
00044    }
00045 
00046    /* 
00047    * Check consistency of data.
00048    */
00049    bool OrthoRegion::isValid() 
00050    { 
00051       for (int i = 0; i < Dimension; ++i) {
00052          if (maxima_[i] <= minima_[i])   
00053             UTIL_THROW("maxima_[i] <= minima_[i]");
00054          if (!feq(lengths_[i], maxima_[i] - minima_[i]))
00055             UTIL_THROW("lengths_[i] != maxima_[i] - minima_[i]");
00056          if (!feq(halfLengths_[i], 0.5*lengths_[i]))
00057             UTIL_THROW("halfLengths_[i] != 0.5*lengths_[i]");
00058       }
00059       if (!feq(volume_, lengths_[0]*lengths_[1]*lengths_[2]))
00060          UTIL_THROW("volume_ != product of lengths_");
00061       return true;
00062    }
00063 
00064 } 
00065 #endif
